LanguageData.DinoPenis.label: dinosaur penis
LanguageData.DinoPenis.description: A penis that is very wide, but not very tall. Its flatened shape is used to spread apart the orifice while the semen comes from the cloaca at the base of the penis.
LanguageData.DinoVagina.label: dinosaur vagina
LanguageData.DinoVagina.description: A egg-laying vagina with a tough hide on the outside.
LanguageData.DinoAnus.label: dinosaur anus
LanguageData.DinoAnus.description: An anus with a tough hide on the outside.
LanguageData.OrcPenis.label: orc penis
LanguageData.OrcPenis.description: A girthy penis with a preputial ring, but otherwise similar to a humanoid penis.
LanguageData.OrcVagina.label: orc vagina
LanguageData.OrcVagina.description: A humanlike vagina with very large lips.
LanguageData.OrcBreasts.label: orc breasts
LanguageData.OrcBreasts.description: A pair of humanlike breasts that sag greatly.
LanguageData.OrcAnus.label: Orc anus
LanguageData.OrcAnus.description: An anus that looks like a mix between an humanlike anus and an equine anus.
LanguageData.ElfPenis.label: elf penis
LanguageData.ElfPenis.description: A thinner and longer humanlike penis. Is that glitter?
LanguageData.ElfVagina.label: elf vagina
LanguageData.ElfVagina.description: A tighter humanlike vagina. Tastes like oranges.
LanguageData.ElfAnus.label: elf anus
LanguageData.ElfAnus.description: A thighter humanlike anus. Smells of flowers.
LanguageData.NecroPenis.label: decayed penis
LanguageData.NecroPenis.description: A penis that is full of stiches, parts that did not belong and is mostly falling apart. It was obviously salvaged from what was left when it decayed. Somehow it still works.
LanguageData.NecroVagina.label: decayed vagina
LanguageData.NecroVagina.description: A vagina that was salvaged from what remained after decaying. Its full of stiches, sometimes there's more than one hole to get into. Its insides are as cold as a grave.
LanguageData.NecroAnus.label: decayed anus
LanguageData.NecroAnus.description: An anus that was salvaged from what was left after decaying. Its insides are as cold as a grave.
LanguageData.NecroBreasts.label: decayed breasts
LanguageData.NecroBreasts.description: A pair of breasts that where obviously salvaged from what was left after decaying. There's stiches all around, multiple nipples, extra patches of skin, and some other times, no skin at all. Sometimes there's not even boobs left.
LanguageData.MonkeyPenis.label: monkey penis
LanguageData.MonkeyPenis.description: A small penis with a rotund head, and no sheath. Somewhat similar to a human's.
LanguageData.PigPenis.label: corkscrew penis
LanguageData.PigPenis.description: A long and thin penis. The flesh of one side of the shaft is softer then other side, causing it to have a corckscrew shape when erect. This penis in particular produces a huge amount of semen for its size.
LanguageData.BearPenis.label: bear penis
LanguageData.BearPenis.description: A thin penis supported by a bone.
LanguageData.TurtlePenis.label: turtle penis
LanguageData.TurtlePenis.description: A large penis that telescopically extends from the shaft. The flat head swells up so much that it looks like a toiled plunger when fully flared.
LanguageData.ElephantPenis.label: elephant penis
LanguageData.ElephantPenis.description: A large penis that telescopically extends from the shaft. When erect, it is very flexible and mobile, enough to lightly manipulate things.
LanguageData.BovinePenis.label: bovine penis
LanguageData.BovinePenis.description: A very long, but also very thin penis that telescopically extends from the shaft. It has very large testicles.
LanguageData.MarinePenis.label: marine penis
LanguageData.MarinePenis.description: A penis that is girthy at the base, but tapers to a very thin point.
LanguageData.CactoidPenis.label: a cactoid penis
LanguageData.CactoidPenis.description: A rough plant-like penis, with a barbed knot at the base, and a thin and flexible shaft. The head ressembles a large cactus flower bud.
LanguageData.CactoidVagina.label: cactoid vagina
LanguageData.CactoidVagina.description: A rough plant-like vagina, with soft thorns lining the inner walls. The thorns grip male genitals during sex.
LanguageData.CactoidAnus.label: cactoid anus
LanguageData.CactoidAnus.description: A rough plant-like anus. No thorns this time.
LanguageData.CactoidBreasts.label: cactoid breasts
LanguageData.CactoidBreasts.description: A pair of rough plant-like breasts, with thorns all around it, and flower-like nipples.
LanguageData.TreePenis.label: a bark penis
LanguageData.TreePenis.description: A naturally grown wooden penis. The testicles are covered in a hard shell, while a wooden sheath protects the phalus. When erect, the large shaft extends, while the barbed head flares, somewhat ressembling a horse penis.
LanguageData.TreeVagina.label: a bark vagina
LanguageData.TreeVagina.description: A naturally grown wooden vagina. While the outside looks like bark, the inside is soft and leaf-like.
LanguageData.TreeAnus.label: a bark anus
LanguageData.TreeAnus.description: A naturally grown wooden anus. While the outside looks like bark, the inside is soft.
LanguageData.TreeBreasts.label: bark breasts
LanguageData.TreeBreasts.description: A pair of naturally grown wooden breasts. Hard bark covers the entire outer portion, while leaving the nipples underneat exposed.
LanguageData.GolemPenis.label: a mineral penis
LanguageData.GolemPenis.description: A hollow shaft made of a hard mineral material, like rock or crystal.
LanguageData.GhoulPenis.label: an irradiated penis
LanguageData.GhoulPenis.description: A humanlike penis that glows slightly. It's very hot to the touch.
LanguageData.GhoulVagina.label: an irradiated vagina
LanguageData.GhoulVagina.description: A humanlike vagina that glows slightly. It is unconfotably hot inside.
LanguageData.GhoulAnus.label: an irradiated anus
LanguageData.GhoulAnus.description: An anus that glows slightly. It is unconfotably hot inside.
LanguageData.GhoulBreasts.label: irradiated breasts
LanguageData.GhoulBreasts.description: A pair of humanlike breasts that glows slightly. They're very hot to the touch.
LanguageData.ScaleBreasts.label: scaly breasts
LanguageData.ScaleBreasts.description: A pair of humanlike breasts fully covered in scales, and no nipples.
LanguageData.TentaclePenis.label: tentacles
LanguageData.TentaclePenis.description: A mass of tentacle-like penises, capable of both restraining and pleasuring.
LanguageData.VinePenis.label: vines
LanguageData.VinePenis.description: Genetically altered vines capable of reproduction.
LanguageData.DemonTentaclesF.label: demon tentacles
LanguageData.DemonTentaclesF.description: A long and flexible tentacle, capable of laying eggs.
LanguageData.BigRaceBreats.label: breasts
LanguageData.BigRaceBreats.description: a pair of breasts found on larger HumanLikes
LanguageData.HorseAnus.label: equine anus
LanguageData.HorseAnus.description: An anus shaped like a dougnut.
LanguageData.CatAnus.label: feline anus
LanguageData.DogAnus.label: canine anus
LanguageData.DragonAnus.label: dragon anus
LanguageData.DragonAnus.description: A rough anus covered in scales on the outside.
LanguageData.AntherPenis.label: anther
LanguageData.AntherPenis.description: A flower's male reproductive organ. A long and thin filament, with a large pollen-producing head in the tip.
LanguageData.PistilVagina.label: pistil
LanguageData.PistilVagina.description: A flower's female reproductive organ. The sticky entrance is connected to the ovaries via a long tube-like structure.
LanguageData.CervineVagina.label: cervine vagina
LanguageData.CervineAnus.label: cervine anus
